Title: Allegiance
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Tony Camerino, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story), Michael Sopczynski (story)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: The team gets involved in a case of international politics when a former government contractor stalks a U.N. diplomat. Meanwhile, an adversary tries to take advantage of Root.
